title: Nancy O'Neill
deck: I am married to the wonderful Joe. We live in Clifton and moved to York from Brighton in 2014. I am a doctor currently training to be a GP. I love spending time with my family and friends and force myself to go to the gym. Joe and I lead a Lifegroup. I run the info point desk which is where you can find all the information about activities going on in the church. I also help with kids work and am really passionate about womenâ€™s ministries.
titleRole: Lifegroup Leader and Info Point Team Leader
